comments.creator: taras.mozilla@glek.net
comments.author: taras.mozilla@glek.net
comments.text: In order to track whether the browser appears responsive, we need an api to report how fast we are drawing. A histogram of framerates during a timeframe is probably a good start.
comments.raw_text: In order to track whether the browser appears responsive, we need an api to report how fast we are drawing. A histogram of framerates during a timeframe is probably a good start.
